title: Concrete-to-Abstract Mathematics Concept Comparison Learning Design for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic arithmetic skills and experience in solving everyday problems
context.additional_context: Utilizing smartphone-compatible VR simulations in low-digital-access learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can convert daily-life case-based math problems into abstract formulas with 80% or higher accuracy
Learners can compare the strengths and weaknesses of two example types (concrete/abstract) and select context-appropriate learning strategies
Learners can apply mathematical concepts to real-life scenarios constructed in VR simulations to complete project deliverables

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
